attributes.action: Strip RSPCA of the there charity status
attributes.additional_details: The RSPCA is one of the UK's richest charity,s but over recent years have been filled with controversy, over animal abuse and neglect to propaganda campaigns, The RSPCA are  on paper a animal welfare charity but in reality an animal rights organisation using public money to fund propaganda campaigns were animal welfare is not an issue please help by  having the RSPCA Charity status revoked

rejection.details: This complaint should be directed at the Charity Commission.
